text:
Yevheniya Mykhaylivna Dembska (; 28 November 1920 – 29 June 2019) was a Ukrainian actress. Dembska was born in Kiev. In 1946, she created the Lviv Theater of Musical Comedy. She was known for her role as Larisa in the 1957 Soviet comedy movie "White Acacia".
Dembska died on 29 June 2019 in Kiev at the age of 98.
